mdRecord.dcterms:title: Gray's new map of Virginia / by Frank A. Gray ; prepared for the Department of Agriculture of Virginia, Col. Randolph Harrison, Commissioner, 1886
New map of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Gray, Frank A.
O.W. Gray & Son.
Virginia. Department of Agriculture
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Insets: Outline map of the United States of America (1:36,000,000) -- South western part of Virginia (same scale as main map) -- Environs of Harpers Ferry (1:200,000) -- Norfolk Harbor (1:80,000)
"Entered according to Act of Congress in the year 1879 by O.W. Gray & Son in the Office of the Librarian of Congress at Washington." -- Immediately following the title.
"Copyright 1877 by O.W. Gray & Son" -- Inside neatline at lower left corner.
From: Virginia. Department of Agriculture Handbook. 5th ed. 1886. (cf. Swem)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Virginia--Maps--19th century.
